245.c: editors Roberto C. Villas Bôas, Roberto Hargreaves, Juliano P. Barbosa

500.a: Papers presented at the 1st CANMET/CETEM Workshop, held in Rio de Janeiro, December of 96

505.a: Removing heavy metals from liquid effluents using biomasses --- Aquatic effects technology evaluation (AETE) program --- The multidisciplinary aspects of mine site rehabilitation --- Buffer minerals effect on acid rock drainage at Poços de Caldas uranium mine (Minas Gerais, Brazil) waste rock pile --- The role of microbiology in the prevention and treatment of acid mine drainage --- National materials policy for sustainable development in Brazil --- Tranport of toxic compounds generated in mineral exploration --- Technology development for the control of acid drainage from mine waster

520.a: This volume brings together all the papers that were presented during the 1st CANMET/CETEM Workshop held in Rio de Janeiro, December of 96. It is hopped that the readers will enjoy the presented subjects dealing with the environmental/sustainable aspects of minerals and ores. The editors like to express their gratitude to CIDA-Canadian International Development Association - and ABC - Agência Brasileira de Cooperação - that provided the means through which the event of the Workshop was possible.
